sentences.en: [as noun wheeling and dealing]the wheeling and dealing of the Wall Street boom years.
sentences.cn: 华尔街兴盛年间的尔虞我诈。

sentences.en: a car with four-wheel drive
sentences.cn: 四轮驱动轿车

sentences.en: a daisy wheel printer
sentences.cn: 菊瓣字轮打印机

sentences.en: a gear wheel
sentences.cn: 齿轮

sentences.en: a journey on wheels.
sentences.cn: 开车旅行。

sentences.en: As the wheel turned, the potter shaped the clay.
sentences.cn: 轮子一边转动，制陶工人一边拉坯。

sentences.en: Catlett got behind the wheel and I sat in back.
sentences.cn: 卡特利特开车，我坐在车子后面。

sentences.en: He downshifted and turned the steering wheel.
sentences.cn: 他调到低速挡，转动方向盘。

sentences.en: He put the jeep in four-wheel drive and splashed up the slope.
sentences.cn: 他将吉普车切换为四轮驱动模式后涉水爬上了坡。

sentences.en: He saw the driver slumped over the wheel.
sentences.cn: 他看见司机一头栽在了方向盘上。

sentences.en: He spun the steering-wheel so that we yawed from side to side.
sentences.cn: 他急速打着舵轮，把我们搞得摇来晃去的。

sentences.en: In his view the wheel of history could not be turned back.
sentences.cn: 在他看来历史的车轮不能倒退。

sentences.en: Kate wheeled her bike into the garage.
sentences.cn: 凯特把她的自行车推进车库。

sentences.en: McKinnon gave the wheel another slight nudge.
sentences.cn: 麦金农又轻轻推了一下轮子。

sentences.en: My co-pilot suddenly grabbed the wheel.
sentences.cn: 我的副驾驶突然抓住了方向盘。

sentences.en: Roberto handed Flynn the keys and let him take the wheel.
sentences.cn: 罗伯托把钥匙递给弗林，让他开车。

sentences.en: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
sentences.cn: 我来开车好吗？

sentences.en: She is hunched forward over the wheel with a maniacal expression.
sentences.cn: 她弓身伏在方向盘前，表情像疯了一样。

sentences.en: she was a bitch on wheels.
sentences.cn: 她是个该死的荡妇。

sentences.en: The action of the crank turns the wheel.
sentences.cn: 这根曲轴的作用是使轮子转动。

sentences.en: The car slid sideways, its rear wheels spinning.
sentences.cn: 汽车向一侧打滑，后轮猛转。

sentences.en: The wheel had long since rusted from years of disuse.
sentences.cn: 多年不用的车轮早已锈迹斑斑。

sentences.en: Unauthorized vehicles will be wheel clamped or towed away.
sentences.cn: 未经许可停放的车辆将会被轮夹锁住或拖走。

words.tran_cn: 滚动；装轮子（wheel的过去分词）
旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行
转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子

phrases.phrase: at the wheel 或 behind the wheel

phrases.tran_cn: 金刚石砂轮；金刚石刀片
第五个轮子；备用轮；多余的人
(英，非正式)（用于强调厌恶某人）该死的
（象征人生浮沉的）命运转盘；人生的变迁
（在商界或政界）耍手腕，玩弄计谋，操纵
独断专行：为自己谋取利益，尤其是采用狡诈、挑衅好斗或肆无忌惮的方式
装载机；轮式装载机，轮胎式装载机

trans.tran_cn: 轮子，方向盘，汽车，运作方式
trans.tran_en: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

trans.tran_cn: 推（带轮物），盘旋，突然转身
trans.tran_en: if birds or planes wheel, they fly around in circles
